Detailed Description

Validator: Regular Expression - runs the given regular expression on the body and checks for a match.
Author:
Bas van Gaalen

Member Function Documentation

ValidatorRe.run ( Response $  oResponse  ) 

Run the validator on given Response object. Should always return a boolean.

Parameters:
$oResponse Response The Response object as it is returned by the server.
Returns:
bool True if everything validates, false if not
Exceptions:
ValidatorException
